name: Unseen Agent
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Your shadow separates from yourself. It inherits your movement speed and can move at any time during your turn. You can see and hear through the shadow as if you were in its location.

Radiant spells that deal damage that strike the shadow immediately end the spell, and you take 4d6 radiant damage that cannot be reduced or negated.

While this spell is active, an attentive creature can notice you are not currently casting a shadow.
empower: The shadow has doubled movement speed.
